website_summaries.verdict: Reasonably priced gloves for youngsters who are mastering goalie skills. These aren't the most durable, but they're worth considering for novices.
pros: Structured for young goalkeepers with protective finger and wrist support, excellent padding, and grippy latex palms
Available in several cool color patterns
cons: Finding the perfect size can be challenging
Loose stitching or tears are possible with typical wear

customer_reviews.title: but they lasted an entire season and seem like they will last at least 1 more
customer_reviews.text: They REALLY help my U10 boy. He's small and has small hands. These gloves really help him block shots over his head as stiff finger splines don't allow his fingers to bend backwards. I think he's more aggressive as he's not worried about hurting his hands. The improved grip and hand size help with his throwing ability (once he got used to them!) They seem a bit delicate so we take very careful care of them, but they lasted an entire season and seem like they will last at least 1 more. He'll probably outgrow them first.
customer_reviews.author: John S Gabrik

customer_reviews.title: 5 months of 5 days a week use and still going for $20ish is a good deal in my book
customer_reviews.text: Decent gloves for the price. My daughter is the full time goalie at u9 , 2 practices a week with team , 2 private lessons with a goalie coach plus games. Gloves were purchased in September it is now January and they have held up decently. You can see some fraying along the finger stitching as well as some flaking of the grips on the palm. 5 months of 5 days a week use and still going for $20ish is a good deal in my book. Ordered a second pair for a backup set to leave in her bag just incase something happens to the first set. Will/would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Bad Buy
customer_reviews.text: We had these gloves for 1 month and both sets ripped in the corner between the thumb and index finger. I would not buy these again. And since it's been 33 days since we got them I can't return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: My son loved it. But in the first use he got a little hole on the palm of the glove.....We don't know if it was because of the surface floor or because of the glove.....The rest ok and he is still using it very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Vera

customer_reviews.title: Finger savers
customer_reviews.text: 7 year old boy starting soccer goalie practice. Gloves fit as expected, lightweight, don't make his hands super sweaty, and have extra plastic in the fingers to keep the chance lower of spraining a finger. They have gotten worn and dirty easily. I would have gotten ones with black on the palms but no big deal at this time.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan R Gehr

customer_reviews.title: Does a Great Job
customer_reviews.text: These were replacement gloves for another purchased at a Sporting Goods store. These are study and have the great finger protectors we’ve come to rely on. My son is eight and he says these are very comfortable and keep his hands from hurting. What else is to be expected?
customer_reviews.author: for what it's worth

customer_reviews.title: Good gloves
customer_reviews.text: Have held up well through a complete soccer season-but only used for games, used old pair for practicing in hopes of stretching the life of these gloves. Have purchased this brand before and find they typically last one season. These will be useable for the next season as well
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Blue

customer_reviews.title: Strong and flexible
customer_reviews.text: My son is a small goalie and loves that these gloves make his hands "super strong". He has no fear of the ball hurting his fingers with these on. There is just enough protection in the fingers while allowing for full movement.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Order just 1 size up
customer_reviews.text: Daughter measured a size 5. I bought her a 6. Fits exactly as intended. She’ll need an upsize by next fall though. The palms are super soft rubber so I’m expecting chunks to come out but they serve their purpose
customer_reviews.author: 417dean

customer_reviews.title: PROTECT YOUR CHILDS FINGERS/INTERNAL FRAME
customer_reviews.text: We got these as a gift. If you have a goalie in your family these are the gloves you should get. The internal frame will save your kids fingers. The technology helps keep their fingers curved so they dont risk breaking them. These should be required for competition/leagues.
customer_reviews.author: Digital Ninja®Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality... although going into buying them ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality...although going into buying them I knew they weren't going to last forever. They will need to be replaced every few months if your child uses them quite regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Streicher

customer_reviews.title: Fabric wears away quickly
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old has been using these for a couple months. We like the finger support and he says the gloves are comfortable, but the material on the palms are already wearing out as part of typical wear and tear. Glad they were cheap! They’re doing the job for now but next time I’ll look for a different/better product.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M.

customer_reviews.title: They fit great and the Neuer branding made it a whole lot ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my 4yearold, They fit great and the Neuer branding made it a whole lot more interesting for him. Great quality and can definetly stand a beating (my kid has used them every day for months and they are still in one piece)
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Valerio N

customer_reviews.title: Poor product
customer_reviews.text: Ripped after 2 weeks. Thought adidas would be better made than that.
customer_reviews.author: JULIE

customer_reviews.title: Fit great for 10 yr old son
customer_reviews.text: Fit great for 10 yr old son. He doesn't play goalie much so they are still in great condition after a few uses. Didn't need to breakin as there ready to use the first day.
customer_reviews.author: BeAn

customer_reviews.title: Check the sizes, foam detirates rapidly
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t read the size guide but I looked it up online and bought 8 based on the measurements but it was way too big. Then the foam part it’s already falling apart
customer_reviews.author: G. Turrent

customer_reviews.title: Size chart is way off
customer_reviews.text: I measured the width of my little girl's hand, then ordered the corresponding glove size. The size that I ordered was delivered, and they were so small that she couldn't get them on. And I was charged to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin c

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I love these gloves. I haven’t used them much and there’s already some wear and tear but they definitely protect my fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Maria Palacios

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. My Grandson likes these gloves a lot. He loves playing goalie so, wear's them a lot. They have held together well so far.
customer_reviews.author: Gramma J

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these! They are by far his favorite goalie gloves so far. He can grip the ball well and the fingersaves are great!
customer_reviews.author: Life Adventurist

customer_reviews.title: Good product! My son likes them a lot
customer_reviews.text: Good product! My son likes them a lot! I gave 4 stars instead of 5 because they got dirty after just one use.
customer_reviews.author: jojo

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable. Preteens love it.
customer_reviews.text: The kids think this is the best pair they have had. We keep buying it over and over again.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Morton

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for our 9 year old! Great quality and he loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: poor quality
customer_reviews.text: my son been using it at weekends games (not too many) and gloves already started to rip
customer_reviews.author: RI

customer_reviews.title: Does what it is supposed to
customer_reviews.text: Great product, definitely do what they are supposed to. Just wish there were some sort of holes or are for breathability.
customer_reviews.author: Amy R. Ennis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just what my granddaughter the goalie needed as her old ones just ripped.
customer_reviews.author: Coldfinger  67

customer_reviews.title: What you get is gonna br a China version of that item in the photo.
customer_reviews.text: Item doesn’t appear exactly as the one shown.I do not recommend dealing with this merchant.What seem like a red nylon thread appears only as a thread of red rubber print.And no fingersave tab sa shown on photo.
customer_reviews.author: Robert S.

customer_reviews.title: Reccomended great quality
customer_reviews.text: I only buy the gloves with the finger save. I have been buying these as my daughter grows out of them.
customer_reviews.author: Jswitt22

customer_reviews.title: Great set of gloves for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Son LOVES them! They are well made, form fitting, and hold up well to his abuse. Sure you can spend double or triple the price and get a better set, but at this age, why would you?
customer_reviews.author: P+R Productions

customer_reviews.title: good fit
customer_reviews.text: My son said these gloves greatly enhanced his ability to play goalie during soccer games.
customer_reviews.author: kyle

customer_reviews.title: Rips Easily
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my 11 year old son around 9/6/16. He has used them about 8 times since then and they are already tearing. Make sure you return before 30 days also, because after that they are nonrefundable.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Alley

customer_reviews.title: The white sponge, petals off easy.
customer_reviews.text: Got great, but the white piece were chipped away little by little when playing.
customer_reviews.author: April Gainer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Ripped and pieces fell out of this pair also as of the last ones
customer_reviews.author: thu

customer_reviews.title: Good finger protection
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in size 5 for Grade 3 Boys team. Fits every player on the team, and they are really liking the finger protection. Working great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking pair of gloves.
customer_reviews.text: I love the color and it appears to be well stitched together. Let's see if it lasts thru this season.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The quality of the gloves
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the gloves is great. Just what we were looking for our grandson.
customer_reviews.author: Ken VanSickle

customer_reviews.title: So I’m satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Quality is ok. They last a limited time but I got them at an unreal price. So I’m satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Christian A Blanco

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves, great price!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is a middle school goalie. These gloves helped her in many saves!! Her fingers don't bend back with these gloves!!
customer_reviews.author: JoJo

customer_reviews.title: Great GK gloves.
customer_reviews.text: Great inexpensive gloves for my U11 player. Don't expect them to last forever. They're good for one season, then replace.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan H Whittington

customer_reviews.title: Good for one season...
customer_reviews.text: They look good and perform to expectations, but the foam padding is already falling apart after less than one season. They did get wet, but that’s part of normal playing conditions.
customer_reviews.author: PO

customer_reviews.title: After just one use, you can tell and see the wear
customer_reviews.text: They are very good, fits good and my daughter loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Eli507

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: These gloves only lasted for one season of soccer. They teared really fast.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are the best!
customer_reviews.text: The best fingersave gloves for my 10 year old son
customer_reviews.author: Any

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The glove is great, people say in other reviews that they break easily but thats just how gloves are
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the #1 Goalie Glove
customer_reviews.text: These fell apart the FIRST weekend my daughter wore them. Not worth the money and definitely not the #1 goalie glove!
customer_reviews.author: Madreader

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: These fit yy 10 year old perfectly. Great quality and great price. She loved that she got to pick a color!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sloppy
customer_reviews.text: These gloves were delivered with a security tag still attached.
customer_reviews.author: mattna

customer_reviews.title: Wear out super fast though
customer_reviews.text: My 9yr-old loves them. Wear out super fast though. Holes are forming in some knuckles and the gloves are a month old.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves I have purchased 2 pairs.
customer_reviews.text: My son plays for two teams and trains or plays 5 days a week. These have held up well (6 months with 2-3 games a week including outdoor, indoor and futsal) and they have remained sticky until foam wears away. Finger savers fit his kid hands well and have not torn or came apart after the usual cleaning required with outdoor use. Some critics has listed pictures of holes in the palm. This is caused by diving on the ground and using you gloved hand to catch yourself. Not even a $150 glove stands up to that abuse so tech them to dive properly so the glove never touches the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Butler

customer_reviews.title: Wear out too quickly
customer_reviews.text: These gloves wear out too quickly! I got these for my son one month ago and they already have a hole on the finger. The palm fabric is too delicate. I expected them to last longer since we pay 40 dlls for a 7 year old size.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great gloves! Fit very well on my 13 year old. Nice quality!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Gruber

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the finger save. Size 7 for my 9 yr old twins
customer_reviews.author: Stephanienurse

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: Trash. Two practices (Girls' U10 Soccer) later, there are chunks falling off of the fingertips.
customer_reviews.author: Giovanni Milicchio

customer_reviews.title: Nice gloves
customer_reviews.text: Second pair of these for my select soccer player. Diadora also makes good gloves. Fingersavers help keep the fingers in the ready position also.
customer_reviews.author: Cruiser77

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: These gloves already have a hole in 2 fingers. They have only been used for one (3 games).
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best goalie gloves! Really protects my sons hands. Truer size

customer_reviews.text: Really good and so far so good with durability. Only problem is that in the picture it looks metallic and dark red but in reality its normal red.

customer_reviews.title: Used/Returned item
customer_reviews.text: No one should pay over $40 for used/returned goalie gloves.
customer_reviews.author: HelpAmazon

customer_reviews.title: do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: they got ripped up on the first wear, like come on what kind of quality is that??

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 8 years grandson is very proud of his gloves.
customer_reviews.author: marialicia

customer_reviews.title: Received Different Style from Listing
customer_reviews.text: I received Predator gloves, NOT the ACE style as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Mize Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great Gloves
customer_reviews.text: They fit,feel, and look great!! My son really like them.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The fingertip part of the gloves are falling apart after 2 months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So Far, So Good
customer_reviews.text: My first attempt at buying goal-keeper gloves for my 11-year old grand daughter seems to have been a success. The fit on these was perfect, according to a web site that discusses how to select soccer equipment. My grand daughter is an excellent all-around player, and she loves the gloves. She usually plays goal-keeper one quarter out of each game, playing forward most of the rest of the game, so she is not hard on these gloves. Her team mates seem to like them also. Good grip and feel. I can't comment on how durable they might wind up being.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald W. Arcuri

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They were gifts to my grandson, and he loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Had the gloves for four weeks and they fell apart.
customer_reviews.author: M. Beckman

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and price for a low-end pair
customer_reviews.text: These gloves do their job. Great quality and price for a low-end pair. Size chart is very accurate and the gloves also fit well on a small adult.
customer_reviews.author: Meowarianna

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: These were not fingersave gloves !! These were training gloves !!!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Over-priced in my opinion. Only last about 3-4 months.
customer_reviews.author: Darren Brown

customer_reviews.title: Happy with these so far
customer_reviews.text: These are great gloves. My son is very happy with them and so far they aren't falling apart like the other pairs we have purchased in the past. He's worn them to two week worth of practice so far and two games. I felt they were a good price, best I could find was on Amazon, and I am willing to spend a little extra money on them if they aren't going to fall apart after only a week like the $15-20 ones we've bought in the past do. I'm not however willing to spend a fortune on goalie gloves for my 7, almost 8 year old son.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsie

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Good goalie gloves for the price. But after 3 games they already had a few small tears.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them, 2nd pair.
customer_reviews.text: Grandsons birthday present, he loves them, These are his 2nd pair.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Pete

customer_reviews.title: We are very disappointed. I'd like to try them again as the ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my 7th grade son for his birthday. He's been using them for about six weeks, and the seam has started to split. He's not unusually rough on them and actually treats them with reverence, as he sees goalkeeping as his calling and these are his tools. We are very disappointed. I'd like to try them again as the rest of the gloves have held up well so far, but I'm nervous about the production quality. You may want to pass and try to find something made better.
customer_reviews.author: M. Cowley

customer_reviews.title: Nice for youth soccer
customer_reviews.text: These have stiff reinforcement in the fingers which will help prevent fingers getting jammed as well as giving a little extra reach for blocks. I think it was worth the extra money over the entry level gloves we used last season. The sizing chart was accurate-got a six for my 9.5 year old and he loves them. I'm not sure they will hold up much better/longer than the cheaper ones though-they appear to use the same material.
customer_reviews.author: Burb LivingTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality/Inconsistent Sizing
customer_reviews.text: I always by Adidas goalie gloves for my 11 year old daughter. These gloves are nice quality but the sizing is not consistent with other Adidas styles. My daughter wears a size 6 glove However the size 6 for this style was way too small. I ordered the size 7 and this size was way too big (it is a 2 size glove difference). Both were labeled with the corresponding sizes. See photo. Size 6 is on left/Size 7 on the right. I returned both as a result.
customer_reviews.author: deb

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed...
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are not good quality and would never buy them again. They didn't even last two weeks before they got holes in them. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Janelle Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Package was delivered on time. Gloves look good but after one use they already ripped at the knuckle, and the palms are already wearing.
customer_reviews.author: Susann

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and fits well. It's a bit pricey but is very durable.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I Have 28000000 ace goalie gloves I love all of them
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia González

customer_reviews.title: Solid gloves
customer_reviews.text: We got these at the end of the season so didn't get much time to use them. They seem to be well constructed though. The finger savers are stiff and might take some getting used to if you haven't used gloves like that before.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia T

customer_reviews.title: these are great gloves, i am a high school goalie and ...
customer_reviews.text: these are great gloves, i am a high school goalie and got these as my practice gloves because they are cheap. They would be really great for U12 and under, and these are junior gloves. But the latex is thin and wears quickly. They are extremely comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Akg

customer_reviews.title: Service was great on shipping and packaging and return of first pair ...
customer_reviews.text: Sizing is very strange. We first ordered a size 6 and my daughter couldn't even get her hands into the glove it was so small. So we returned and ordered a size 7 they are HUGE on her... will need to return this pair as well. Discouraged with sizing. Service was great on shipping and packaging and return of first pair thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Cranston

customer_reviews.title: Great goalie gloves
customer_reviews.text: My son has small hands and these fit perfectly. Played an indoor season with them and they held up well. The finger saver protection is great.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hale

customer_reviews.title: Nicely grips the ball and saves the fingers! SCORE!
customer_reviews.text: My 11yo goalie loves these! She says that they are nice as "grippy" and have very nice finger spines. She LOVES the color combination, which is oh so important! ;) Great price.
customer_reviews.author: SwimMomTop Contributor: Ukuleles

customer_reviews.title: Good priced jr gloves
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is a competitive '06 keeper and she only uses these gloves. We get 2 at a time so she has a seperate pair for pratice and a pair for games. The game gloves usually last a year, the pratice gloves get pretty warn out before the year is threw.
customer_reviews.author: Beetleman

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves for U10
customer_reviews.text: So far, these gloves are handling great. Have gone through 8 games and 16 practices with out a tear or rip. The finger saver gives good protection and gives my daughter greater confidence to attack the ball.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. We haven't been impressed with some of the ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. We haven't been impressed with some of the other top brands for youth goalies. I hate spending a lot of money on youth equipment simply because it gets outgrown so quickly. Other brands have barely lasted a few games without chunks of foam tearing out, even though we take excellent care of them. These seem like they are holding up well. They have only been worn for a few practices & 3 or 4 games, but they already look better than her last ones did. Adidas seems to have the best quality for youth goalie gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Julie P

customer_reviews.title: Great goalie gloves
customer_reviews.text: Hear gloves are the hot of the soccer team. My daughter played on a competitive U 11 team and all the goalies want to wear these gloves. We have actually already purchased a second pair as a back up
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: Not durable. Ripped after a few use practicing at home. Actually after his first game I could tell he woukd not be able to get much use out of the glove. Sorry I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Dawkins

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Its fits perfectly if you get the right size. Looks and feels good. But the sponge material wears off quickly. Even with a single game, I could see the sponge coming off.
customer_reviews.author: S.T

customer_reviews.title: Great Gloves!
customer_reviews.text: These were purchased for my 7 year old grandson. He was so thrilled to receive them and wore them around the house all day saying he couldn't wait until he was on the field.
customer_reviews.author: My Opinion

customer_reviews.title: Good hands.
customer_reviews.text: The kid loves em'; The palms padding is legit and knuckles are reinforced. Definitely provides the impact protection needed at high level soccer for a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: Wyman

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking gloves however the foam came off the gloves after my son played two games. he only used them to play games not practice. Too late to return 30 days? Poor quality would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: David Hunsche

customer_reviews.title: Nice keeper gloves
customer_reviews.text: These gloves have been used by my U10 soccer team for 3 seasons and are still going strong. The foam is starting to crack on the palms but over-all these are great gloves!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon K Martin

customer_reviews.title: My 9 year old daughter loves them. The only ...
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old daughter loves them. The only reason for the 3 star review is that she has only used them for about two weeks and they already are starting to tear. For someone in recreational soccer these gloves would probably work but for someone in travel who uses them 4-5 days a week, you may want to look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Solorzano

customer_reviews.title: Could Be Made More Durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 12yrold son who plays goal from "time to time". I like the finger savers but they are already coming apart in under 1 year of general use. For the price I was expecting more durability from Adiddas.
customer_reviews.author: Madscot

customer_reviews.title: My daughter uses these for light training days only. ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses these for light training days only. she will not use them for game day Or heavy practice days because she said that padding is not thick enough.
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT OWENS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: they fit great and my son and his team mates love these soccer goalie gloves!
customer_reviews.author: Walter Quinn

customer_reviews.title: I have no complains about theae gloves, however size ...
customer_reviews.text: I have no complains about theae gloves, however size 4 was a bit small for my 9yr Old some who is very thin. That’s why I give it 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They look great and the grip is very good
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these gloves but he had to get used to having the plastic staves in the fingers. They look great and the grip is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

product_meta.title: adidas Performance ACE Fingersave Junior Goalie Gloves
feature_bullets: Fingersave technology resists pressure when pushed backward for effective ball deflection; elastic bandage for perfect fit and wrist support
All around great grip, softness and durability in all kinds of weather, and fits snug and tight for maximum range of motion
Get extra cushioning during impact from the padded palm; ideal for beginner goalies
To size gloves, measure the width of the part of your palm just below the knuckles, excluding the thumb
Most goalkeepers prefer gloves a little larger than they need, giving them a larger surface area to stop the ball without sacrificing control
